Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add stacking limit \(1 unit per tile\) and city blockade mechanics

Major gameplay changes:
- Stacking limit: Only 1 unit per tile, units can pass through friendly tiles
- City blockade: Cities cannot produce when enemy unit is adjacent
- Production placement: Units spawn adjacent if city tile is occupied

Technical changes:
- MovementSystem: Allow pathing through friendly units, prevent stopping
- WarfireGame: Add blockade checks, update produceUnit spawn logic
- GameMap: Add isCityBlockaded\(\) helper method
- RenderSystem: Add visual blockade indicators \(red border + swords icon\)
- UIController: Show blockade status and stacking limit info
- AISystem: Respect tile occupancy and city blockades

Also includes existing changes from working directory.
EOF
\)")
